definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain

sentences.english: The apoptotic cells in both the SSDH and SQD groups were higher than those in the control group.
sentences.chinese: 凋亡細胞脾胃溼熱組和脾氣虛組均高於正常對照組。

sentences.english: Objective:To study the mechanism of coronary heart disorder heart Qi belonging to deficiency and blood stasis type treated by tonifying Qi and invigorating blood decoction.
sentences.chinese: 探討益氣活血湯治療心氣虛血瘀型冠心病的作用機制。

sentences.english: Invigorating the lung, nourishing the kidney and preventing asthma were the main ways to CCP.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲，CCP緩解期以肺腎氣虛爲主要發病機制。

sentences.english: Advanced neural center participates in the regulation during spleen-deficiency combined with gastric ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 高級神經中樞參與脾氣虛合併胃潰瘍疾病過程的調節。

sentences.english: Backache kidney virtual, put chestnut porridge.
sentences.chinese: 腰痠腎氣虛，煮粥放板栗。

sentences.english: For those who has a weak digestive system or having diarrhea, please avoid over dosage.
sentences.chinese: 有氣虛胃寒，食慾不振及腹瀉的患者應避免過量食用。

definition: deficiency of yin 陰|阴[yin1] in TCM
excess of internal heat due to poor general condition (TCM)/the prestige of another person, which one borrows for oneself
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
an excess of heat caused by a deficiency in Yin energy (idiom)
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
